thama janathawata aahara pana sapayiya nohaki ratak nawika thahanamak panawimen danagaswimata wideshayanta hakiya wa labe.me thaththwayan wataha gath warthamana rajaya gambada palath krushikarmaya padanam kota sanwardhanaya kirimata gena athi piyawara anagathaya udesa, wisheshayen ma dirgha kalina samayak uda kirima udesa pihitawana yahapath prathipaththiyaki.me nawa sanwardhana wyaparayan sarthaka wa kriyathmaka kalahoth, gramiya pradeshawala ha wisheshayen wiyali kalapaye gowin athara nawa wyawasayakayin bihi karamin nawa madhyama panthiyak athi kala haki ya.me sanwardhana wyapruthi, prajawa sanwardhanaya karamin ma hangi samaja mehewarak kirimata gath wayamaki.me samajayiya ha aarthika sanwardhana wyapruthiwala wadi wadiyen aayojanaya karamin shri lankawa ha ehi janathawa wetha thama ladiya wa pennum kirimata paudgalika anshayata mahangu awasthawak elambai atha.
boho sayanawaladi dakinnata labenne asarana wu das saha his pasumbi samaga susumlana wadihitiyanya.
habayi bola kiyana tharam kuppa wada korana bawak mama danagena hitiye na oon. jaya...!

namuth edata wada wides sancharakayin, wisheshayen indiyanuwan bas pitin ena thanak ada methana.

kolambaa wishwa widyalaye shri pali mandapaye janamadhya adhyana anshaye sthapitha kirimata yojitha shrawya drushya chithragaraya sandaha wana giwisum athsan kirima kolambaa wishwa widyalaye sanathana sabha mandirayedi ada (17) sidukeruna.kolambaa wishwa widyalaye upakulapathi mahacharya lakshman disanayaka saha japan thanapathi kenachi suganuma yana ayage pradhanathwayen mema giwisum athsan kirima siduwuna.japan rajaye aadhara yatathe rupiyal laksha 120ka wiyadamin, kamara pahasukam, pasu nishpadana saha warna sanyojana pahasukam wani athi nawina pahasukam sahithawa mema chithragaraya idikirimata salasumkara thibenawa.shri pali mandapaye mandapadhipathi mahacharya ranjan hettiaarachchi, shri pali mandapaye janamadhya anshaye anshadhipathi aacharya dharmakirithi shri ranjan, shri pali mandapaye hitapu mandapadhipathi jyeshta kathikacharya tiyudar wirasinha athulu aaradhitha amuththan wishala pirisak ema awasthawata ekwa sitiya.uthsawayata ekwu pradhana aaradhithayan mema wyapruthiya sambandhayen melesa adahas dakwa sitiya.
ohu yaddi dipowe gettu wasa thibuni.

richad piris tayar samagame adhyaksha/samanyadhikari pushpika janadhira mahatha aapidag intarnashanal karya mandalaya samanga.richad piris samuha wyaparayata anubaddhitha, aapidag intarnashanal samagamata, karmantha sanwardhana amathyanshaya pa්ramithi ha paladayitha kalamanakarithwaya udesa wu gaurawaya sammanaya pasugiyada piri namiya.ema sammanaya pirinamima, wyaparika kalamanakarana jathika aayathana sha්rawanagaraye di pawathi uthsawayaka di karmantha sanwardhana amathya kumara welgama mahathage athin pasugiyada sidu kerini.ema sammanaya pilibandawa madhyayanta adahas dakwamin, richad piris tayar samagame, adhyaksha/samanyadhikari, pushpika janadhira mahatha pawasuwe, “mema sammanaya dina ganimata wyapara kalamanakarana jathika aayathanaya wisin sakas kala pa්ramithinta anukulawima tharamak abhiyogathmakayi.ehi niladharin ape meheyum ha nishpadana ki්rayawaliya nibandawama thakseru ha wigananaya kirimak sidukale apa samagama owun wisin sakas kala mangapenwim akhandawa ki්rayathmaka karannedayi soya balimatayi.amudrawya bhawithaya, balashakthi paribhojanaya, karyamandala paripalanaya ha 5 es pa්ramithiya pawathwagena yamayi.mema dadi wiganana ki්rayawaliya osse gaman kirime pa්rathipalayak lesin, richad piris tayar samagame apata da ape kshetha්rayata mangahari giya nawathama thaththwa ha pa්ramithin hi abhyasaye yedawimatath awasthawa uda wuna” yannaya.

ganwathura basa yamath samanga uthuru mada palathe janathawa wasangatha rogayangen bera ganima sandaha wishesha saukhyarakshaka wadapiliwelak arambaana lesa uthuru mada palath pradhana amathi es. em. ranjith samarakon mahatha adala ansha wetha danum di thibe.ganwathura basa yamath samanga sengamalaya, una sannipathaya, pachanaya, athisaraya wani wasangatha roga pathira yamata athi idakada walaka dimata unandu wannayi pradhana amathiwaraya saukhya niladharingen illa sitiyi.wathura unukara niwa panaya kirima, ganwathuren apawithra wu lin shuddha pawithra kirima, linwalata klorin yedima, jala perana upakarana beda dima, ganwathura basayana gammanawala wahama arambaana lesath amathiwaraya danum di atha.elawalu ha palawarga aaharayata ganime di hondata soda aaharayata ganna lesath amuwen aaharayata noganna lesath me athara saukhya baladharihu janathawagen illa sitithi..
